resources.string: "Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions."

Daily Milk is an idea based on the daily milk need of our coworkers.
The idea was based on some kind of food-delivery service like Lieferservice.at.
For more information about our project write us an email.(jan.burtscher@student.htldornbirn.at)
\u2022Log in with your username and password.
\u2022Select your drink and place the order with the button below.
\u2022You can only order once every 20 hours.
\u2022You will recieve your drink shortly after you ordered it.\n
